recipesJson.name: A Pair of Pears
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
**A Pair of Pears Custard Pie**
A simple recipe made with a pair of pears üçê 

**WF Ripe Pear SC** is a sweet, ripe, juicy pear. Pair this with **MB Shape Up Pear**, which offers a realistic pear with plenty of texture and taste, wow a terrific combo. 
**INW Custard** with **WF Creme Br√ªl√©e Cookie SC** work great together for the custard base and to create the pie. Top this with some **OOO Powdered Sugar**.  Delicious üòã. I did add .5% of FLV sweetness, feel free to add sweetener to your preference. 
Enjoy.
